ModMetaData.name: F3: Spacer Jumpsuits and More
ModMetaData.author: ハグ
ModMetaData.description:
Brave the elements in style, even the vacuum of space! This mod adds a series of jumpsuits made from hypermesh: hyperweave treated to enhance its electrostrictive properties such that it can become airtight and insulatory when exposed to harsh conditions.
Dress like a cruiser captain, a hotshot pilot, or space station lab staff, and rest assured in the knowledge that hypermesh suits DO NOT become malodorous with continuous wear, unlike previous-generation synthread jumpsuits. Why cram yourself into tens of kilograms of plasteel when lightweight hypermesh can deliver similar* performance**? Now that's Functional Future Fashion™!
Artwork by Toriyoshi
